LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Gunlink.label: Night Vision Goggles
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Gunlink.description: An optical enhancement device which amplifies existing light in low-light conditions and projects it through the display on to the users eyes. Compatible with most helmets and can be worn stand-alone.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_StealthMask.label: Stealth Mask
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_StealthMask.description: A piece of fabric which obscures the wearer's face.
